page.title: 13BRADWELL CHARITY CYCLE RIDE
page.content: Every year since 1980 a charity cycle ride has been organised in Bradwell. The participants ride twenty miles and are sponsored. The ride starts at 11.00 am and finishes when the last person arrives back. This event is usually held on the first Sunday in July. People who are taking part meet at the Bradwell Community Centre.There is a party here in the evening when the ride has finished. People who take part not only come from Bradwell but also from such places as Gt. Yarmouth, Gorleston, Belton and Fritton.Last year, over Â£2000 was raised. The charities to benefit have been: 1980-{Anthony Nolan bone marrow fund. 1981-{A local disabled club 1982-{Jim'll fix it 1983-{Big C scanner appeal 1984-{Breast screening fund
